Class AIAdaptationConfig

java.lang.Object
AI.api.AIAdaptationConfig
public class AIAdaptationConfig extends Object
Configuration class for AI agent setup and adaptation. Encapsulates all configuration parameters needed to set up an AI agent, making it easy to pass complex configurations without changing method signatures.
Author:
Team 04
